text: I wanted to add some chicken to my pasta,  willing to paid extra.  They would not add it to my order.   I can and have had this all over in different states.. Florida ,  Indiana, Michigan.      But I will not be back.  Thanks.

name: Sam Archer
text: This Pizza Hut does not deliver but is a dine-in/take-out restaurant. Even still, I prefer to call in my orders here over the one on Avalon because it's close to me haha. Both are great places though. I've never had a problem here.

name: nbttl 1
text: Love the staff at muscle shoals Pizza Hut. They hustle, they work to make your experience worth while and worth your time. They respect you, know you, and work for you. Great management and staff. TIP THEM!!!
